long_description: The Continental GatorSkin foldable tire features a supple 180 tpi casing, long-lasting rubber compound and great puncture protection for all-around road riding use. High-mileage rubber compound offers lasting performance; smooth center with subtle shoulder tread supplies minimal rolling resistance with good cornering grip. PolyX Breaker puncture protection and DuraSkin sidewall protection deliver excellent resistance to thorns, shards and other puncture instigators. 180 tpi casing is supple for great road feel; folding bead helps keep weight low. Recommended pressure for the Continental GatorSkin foldable clincher bike tire is 95 - 120 psi (6.5 - 8.2 bar).
short_description: The Continental GatorSkin foldable tire features a supple 180 tpi casing, long-lasting rubber compound and great puncture protection for all-around road riding use.
